name: Kingdom Hearts III: Re Mind
description:
Kingdom Hearts III: Re Mind is a RPG game developed by Square Enix. It was originally released in 2020. It was published by Square Enix. Kingdom Hearts III: Re Mind has a Metascore of 66, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Kingdom Hearts III: Re Mind on Xbox One, PlayStation 4 and PC. The game is sold via Xbox Store, PlayStation Store and Epic Games Store.
